title: Is Logic Pro worth it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. $199 for a complete DAW workstation, which includes so many instruments, samples etc. Includes all functionalities etc, yes it’s worth it. The question is, what are you needs? Are you primarily using it as a recorder or are you using it for electronic production? And it sounds great. And it’s great on the CPU. It all depends on you and what background you are coming from. Are you coming from Pro Tools? Or Cubase? Or GarageBand? Or are you fresh, new off the block? For composition, it’s indispensable, and dirt cheap too!

If you’re on a recent Mac and need a full featured linear DAW, Logic Pro is far and away the best deal to be had. In that case, it’s “worth it” as nothing else comes close for the price. If you DON’T need a full featured linear DAW, then there’s no point to spending $200 USD on software you don’t need. Ask a more specific question and you’ll get a more specific answer.
